data.manual_installation:
eSIM name: Asialink

Coverage: Bangladesh, Cambodia, China, Hong Kong(China), India, Indonesia, Japan, Laos, Macau, Malaysia, Pakistan, Philippines, Singapore, South Korea, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam.

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM-capable device you need to print or display this QR code on another device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Enable data roaming.
